translation.en: -February 1993. -A massive explosion
ripping through the lower basement sections
of the World Trade Center under tower number two.
A terrorist bomb, how horrific a crime this is.
translation.zh: 炸弹恐怖攻击是如此罪大恶极

translation.en: August 1998.
Our embassies in Nairobi and Dar es Salaam were bombed.
translation.zh: 我国在内罗毕和达累斯萨拉姆的 大使馆遭遇炸弹袭击

translation.en: The bin Laden terrorist network was responsible.
translation.zh: 袭击为本拉登恐怖组织所为

translation.en: Suicide bombers blew a hole in the ship.
translation.zh: 自杀式炸弹攻击将船炸开一个大洞

translation.en: My prayers are with the families of those killed
translation.zh: 我在此为科尔号军舰爆炸案中

translation.en: at the explosion involving the US naval vessel Cole.
Hidden in the mountains of Afghanistan,
translation.zh: 本拉登藏身于阿富汗深山中

translation.en: bin Laden planned these attacks.
September 9th, 2001.
Ahmad Shah Massoud, the leader of the Northern Alliance,
translation.zh: 北方联盟领袖艾哈迈德沙赫马苏德

translation.en: was assassinated by two members of al Qaeda.
translation.zh: 遭两名基地组织成员暗杀

translation.en: Massoud's death destabilized the Northern Alliance,
translation.zh: 马苏德之死破坏了北方联盟的稳定

translation.en: removing the only threat to the Taliban's power in Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 清除了塔利班在阿富汗的唯一威胁

translation.en: I can't believe we have a fireplace.
Yeah. Sort of a fireplace. It's propane.
translation.zh: 是啊 勉强算个壁炉吧 那是烧丙烷的

translation.en: It's a fireplace.
Maddy?
All right. Up you go.
Okay. Let's get your shoes on.
Hey, I like your drawings.
-It's a ladybug. -A ladybug?
Wow, it's beautiful.
I don't wanna unpack this room until we get the walls painted.
translation.zh: 我想等我们粉刷完 再整理东西

translation.en: And by "we," I mean you.
translation.zh: 我说的“我们” 指的是你

translation.en: Sounds like a lot of work.
-What does that mean? -Paint the walls, and I'll show you.
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -你乖乖粉刷墙 就知道了

translation.en: I love this house.
You gotta learn Spanish, Daddy.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你要学西班牙语啦

translation.en: Yeah, it's on the list, sweetie.
translation.zh: 已经列入待办清单了 宝贝

translation.en: You taking me to school again?
Uh-huh. And picking you up.
translation.zh: 是啊 我还会去接你呢

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah! Turn that down, sweetie.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -是啊！宝贝 把声音关小

translation.en: Daddy, look.
...where the Trade Centers are.
Two planes have crashed into the World Trade Center
translation.zh: 两架飞机撞向世贸中心大楼

translation.en: in an apparent terrorist attack on the country.
translation.zh: 这显然是对我国的恐怖袭击

translation.en: We have reported that one of the planes
was an American Airlines 767 that had been hijacked...
translation.zh: 为被挟持的美国航空波音767班机

translation.en: -Hey! -Thank God!
-Finally. -Okay!
Really?
-What the hell, man? -Relax, bro.
-You know how nuts traffic is. -Traffic?
-We've been freezing out here all night! -Relax, bro.
translation.zh: 我们在这里冻了一晚！ -放轻松 老兄 -你怎么不

translation.en: -Why don't you jump in this river? -Did you stop at Starbucks?
translation.zh: -放轻松 老兄 -你怎么不 -跳进河里看看？ -你去了星巴克吗？

translation.en: -Where's my latte? -Milo, it's 8:30.
translation.zh: -我的拿铁呢？ -麦洛 都8点半了

translation.en: -What happened? -What? You guys don't know?
translation.zh: -出了什么事？ -什么？你们不知道吗？

translation.en: No, we were in the river, man.
translation.zh: 我们泡在河里 好吗？

translation.en: Goddamn, they're low.
Is that part of a drill?
Ain't no drill.
Get me Josh Bailey at USASOC intel, please.
translation.zh: 请接陆军特战部军情队的乔希贝利

translation.en: -Bailey on line three, sir. -Did you say line three?
translation.zh: -长官 贝利在三号线 -你是说三号线吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Sound off!
Josh, Jesus Christ, you guys shit the bed on this one, huh?
translation.zh: 乔希 妈的 你们这次真是惨歪歪

translation.en: Was it confirmed?
Well, it's not my job to know where, that's your job.
translation.zh: 搞清楚地点是你们的工作

translation.en: All we are is ready.
Well, quit wasting time talking to me then.
translation.zh: 那就别跟我废这么多话了

translation.en: Why are you here? Out of uniform with that fur on your face.
translation.zh: 你来这干嘛？没穿制服还满脸胡子

translation.en: Didn't you get back from Kuwait three weeks ago?
translation.zh: 你不是三周前就从科威特回来了吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir. Apologies. Technically, I'm still on leave.
translation.zh: 长官 抱歉 严格来说我还在放假

translation.en: Well, if you're here today, leave is over.
translation.zh: 既然你人都来了 那你的假期就结束了

translation.en: Take a look around, Captain. We're a little busy.
translation.zh: 你自己看看 我们有点忙

translation.en: -What do you want? -I want back on my team, sir.
translation.zh: -有什么事？ -长官 我要归队

translation.en: You don't have a team.
You've been rotated to my staff. At your request, by the way.
translation.zh: 你准备当我的幕僚吧 这都是你自己要求的

translation.en: That was before. Before guys were flying fucking planes into buildings.
translation.zh: 那是之前 在那些家伙他妈的 开飞机撞大楼之前

translation.en: Well, your warrant officer turned in his retirement papers,
translation.zh: 你的准尉已经申请退伍

translation.en: and you've been moved up.
So, your team doesn't exist, all right?
You'll be filtered into new ODAs when the opportunities arise.
translation.zh: 等有机会 再让你进新的派遣队

translation.en: If I were you, I'd get to your desk and start studying intel on Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 我建议你回座位上 研究阿富汗情报

translation.en: Taliban sponsored the attack, sir?
translation.zh: 长官 幕后主使是塔利班吗？

translation.en: Al Qaeda planned this attack. They have refuge in Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 基地组织策划了这起袭击 他们目前躲在阿富汗

translation.en: But Middle East is our assigned region, sir.
translation.zh: 长官 我们主要负责的是中东地区

translation.en: Really? I didn't know that! Here's the thing, though.
translation.zh: 是吗？我都不知道！ 你还谈不上主要负责哪里 因为你不属于任何一支队伍！

translation.en: You don't have a region because you don't have a team!
translation.zh: 你还谈不上主要负责哪里 因为你不属于任何一支队伍！

translation.en: So, get back to your goddamn desk, and let me do my job!
translation.zh: 回你他妈的座位去 别打扰我做事！

translation.en: -Fuck. -Sergeant, who's on line four?
It was not long before that tower collapsed.
translation.zh: 不久之后 那座塔就坍塌了

translation.en: The loss of life so far is catastrophic, estimated at 10,000.
translation.zh: 目前的伤亡情况非常惨重 估计有一万人受伤

translation.en: But that number could go much higher.
translation.zh: 但是伤亡人数有可能远不止此

translation.en: Uh, these images from just across the Potomac River of the Pentagon
translation.zh: 这是在波多马克河对岸 拍摄的五角大楼画面

translation.en: still on fire, a fire burning out of control
translation.zh: 熊熊大火尚未得到控制

translation.en: after a hijacked airliner, another one,
translation.zh: 因为又有一架被劫持的客机

translation.en: we believe this one to have been a United Airlines flight,
translation.zh: 这次应该是一架联航客机

translation.en: smashed into the Pentagon around...
-Yo. What's up, Cap? -What up, Milo?
-What are you doing here? -Trying to get my team back.
Your little jalapeño ain't gonna be too happy about that.
translation.zh: 你老婆可能会不太高兴吧

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe not.
What are you talking about? This team's done.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？团队解散了

translation.en: Thanks to you, we're gonna watch this whole thing go down on CNN.
translation.zh: 都怪你 害我们只能干坐在这看新闻

translation.en: What I did, I did for my family.
I didn't know there was a war coming.
translation.zh: 我又不知道战争会爆发

translation.en: You and your family are gonna be fine.
From your office, you'll be fine!
translation.zh: 你躲在办公室做点文书工作 真是太好了！

translation.en: You think I'm gonna be sitting on the sidelines with this happening, Dill?
translation.zh: 你躲在办公室做点文书工作 真是太好了！ 出了这种事 你以为我会袖手旁观吗？

translation.en: Huh?
Did you talk to Bowers?
Yeah, I did. I told him I want back in, and he said no.
translation.zh: 谈了 我说我要归队 但他说不行

translation.en: He won't say no to me.
Tell me you didn't submit that paperwork.
translation.zh: 你的请调文件还没交吧

translation.en: -No, it's on my desk. -Good.
translation.zh: -还没 还在我桌上呢 -不错

translation.en: Osama bin Laden has been...
If anybody in the Middle East did this, the Fifth Group's up.
translation.zh: 如果是中东的人干的 第五特种作战群就要上了

translation.en: Fuck yeah, bro. Fuck yeah. Or...
translation.zh: 是啊 兄弟 没错

translation.en: -I mean, we would have been. -If we had a fucking captain.
translation.zh: -本来是我们上战场的 -要是我们有队长的话就能上了

translation.en: We'll be in this fight, boys. You mark my words.
translation.zh: 我们会参战的 放心好了

translation.en: He's in a meeting, sir. It's a private meeting, sir.
translation.zh: 长官 他在开会 是私人会议 长官

translation.en: Your retirement papers?
There's nothing to submit, sir. I'm still Chief Warrant Officer of ODA 595,
translation.zh: 我不打算提交任何文件了 我还是第五特战群595小队的准尉

translation.en: and my team has more combat experience than the rest of Fifth Group combined.
translation.zh: 我们的小队实战经验 比第五特种作战群其他人加起来还多

translation.en: All that hell we went through in Somalia, Desert Storm... that means something.
translation.zh: 我们在索马里和沙漠风暴行动 曾吃过的苦不是白搭的

translation.en: You break this team up, you're cutting the head off your most venomous snake, sir.
translation.zh: 你拆散这支队伍就是自废武功 长官

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay. I'll pull you a captain and get you in the game.
translation.zh: 好吧 我给你们指派个队长 你们就能上战场了

translation.en: We have a captain, sir.
translation.zh: 我们有队长了 长官

translation.en: You have a captain with no combat experience.
translation.zh: 那位队长没有作战经验

translation.en: He's never been to war. He's only led you in training.
translation.zh: 他没上过战场 只带过你们训练

translation.en: He's already been bumped up to staff. This is a career wrecker.
translation.zh: 他已经升任幕僚了 让他当队长是毁了他的前程

translation.en: You understand that, right?
Well, all due respect, I've spent two years with that fellow
translation.zh: 恕我直言 我在那家伙手下

translation.en: leading our team.
If you think furthering his career is why he joined,
translation.zh: 如果你觉得他从军是为了升官

translation.en: you need to get to know your captain, sir.
translation.zh: 那你真是太不了解他了 长官

translation.en: As you were.
-Sorry about the desk. -No, no. It's a good kill.
translation.zh: -抱歉乱踹桌子 -没关系 踹得漂亮

translation.en: Besides, you're not gonna need it where you're going.
translation.zh: 反正你要去的地方也用不上那玩意

translation.en: Special Forces doesn't have thermals?
translation.zh: 特种部队没有配发保暖内衣吗？

translation.en: -Army wasn't expecting this. -Yeah.
Well, that makes two of us.
You tell him.
I'm not doing your dirty work for you.
translation.zh: 我才不想收拾你的烂摊子

translation.en: Marsha.
I'll love you when you get back.
translation.zh: 等你回来了 我才会爱你

translation.en: Hey, buddy.
Leaving?
Yeah, I gotta go.
How long?
Don't know.
Hey.
You know I love you, right?
Wow... Made it all the way to the oven, huh, babe?
translation.zh: 哇 你都开始刷烤箱了？

translation.en: Some wives cry. I clean.
translation.zh: 别人的老婆哭哭啼啼 我就洗洗刷刷

translation.en: Hey, uh, I was thinking...
You're gonna have all the time in the world to clean that oven once I'm gone.
translation.zh: 我走了以后 你想刷多久就刷多久

translation.en: And I'm kind of running out of time, so...
translation.zh: 我马上就走了 所以…

translation.en: Yeah, and I bet I know just how you wanna spend it.
translation.zh: 我敢说 我知道你想怎么打发时间

translation.en: I mean, I have two hours. I'll be really quick.
translation.zh: 我还有两个小时 我会超级快的

translation.en: -Super quick. -Yeah, not a chance.
Holding out is the only way I can guarantee you come back to me.
translation.zh: 只有让你憋着 才能确保你会回来

translation.en: Please?
Just the tip.
-Okay, you know what? -Mm-hm?
War's gonna be over so quick. It's gonna be over in like a week. I promise.
translation.zh: 战争很快就会结束 一周内就会了结 我保证

translation.en: Go wake up the kids.
Spend the time with them.
I know what I signed up for. They don't.
translation.zh: 我有心理准备了 他们没有

translation.en: Don't wish for what you don't want.
You were on a flight to New York two months ago.
translation.zh: 你两个月前也搭乘过去纽约的航班

translation.en: You don't have to justify it to me.
I'm a soldier's wife.
And I've been lucky.
All I've had to worry about so far is malaria and chopper crashes.
translation.zh: 我目前就担心 疟疾肆虐 还有直升机坠机事故

translation.en: Most dangerous part's the ride in and out.
translation.zh: 起降的时候是最危险的

translation.en: Not anymore.
I don't care how long you're gone,
as long as you come back.
-You understand? -Yeah, I do.
Then say you're coming home.
I can't, baby. It's bad luck.
I need to hear you say it.
I'm coming home.
Hey, ODA 595. Where do we bunk?
translation.zh: 我们是第五特战群595小队 我们住哪？

translation.en: You see those Quonset huts?
Those are for the teams. ODA numbers are on the door, sir.
translation.zh: 就是营房 门上有小队编号 长官

translation.en: Don't salute in-country.
Are you trying to get our captain killed, bro?
translation.zh: 兄弟 你想害死我们队长吗？

translation.en: -These are all friendlies. -Oh, yeah?
Who, that guy? That's not my friend.
translation.zh: 那家伙吗？他可不是我朋友

translation.en: -That guy's definitely not my friend. -Fucking Diller, bro.
translation.zh: -那家伙绝对不是我朋友 -迪勒啊 你这家伙

translation.en: -That could be my friend. He looks nice. -That guy?
translation.zh: -我可以跟他交朋友 他人好像不错 -那家伙吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Heads up.
What's up, guys?
Looks like Christmas came early.
Oh, yeah. Ho, ho, ho. Where have you guys been?
We went to a fucking Nickelback concert.
translation.zh: 去听他妈的五分钱的演唱会了

translation.en: How was it? Throw your panties on stage?
translation.zh: 怎么样？有没有人把内裤扔到台上？

translation.en: No... We got stuck in a holding position until the weather broke.
translation.zh: 没…我们要在这一直等到放晴才起飞

translation.en: The weather here doesn't change until June.
translation.zh: 听说这种天气会持续到6月

translation.en: Snowed last night. So, get used to it.
translation.zh: 昨晚还下雪 赶快习惯吧

translation.en: -What? Really? -Yeah.
Hey, what's all this?
Someone gave the quartermaster a Gold Card.
translation.zh: 有人给军需官办了金卡

translation.en: Now, the only unit with any cold weather tac-gear is the 10th Mountain.
translation.zh: 只有第10山地师有防寒装备

translation.en: -They ain't sharing. -Make sure everyone carries a GPS.
translation.zh: -他们不分给别人 -确定人手一个GPS定位仪

translation.en: I couldn't find one map of this place.
translation.zh: 我找不到这里的地形图

translation.en: Copy that, Captain.
translation.zh: -知道了 长官 -你们看515小队

translation.en: Hey, look what 515 left outside their tents.
translation.zh: -知道了 长官 -你们看515小队 把什么留在门外

translation.en: -Hey, guys, quiet down. -It's Britney Spears!
translation.zh: -大家安静 -小甜甜布兰妮来了！

translation.en: Five months in-country, this hair is what you're getting.
translation.zh: 在这待五个月头发就会变这样

translation.en: Hey. Is that a wig? Can I touch it? Just one time.
translation.zh: 那是假发吗？可以让我摸一下吗？

translation.en: Ask Coffers' wife, man. She loves it.
translation.zh: 问考佛的老婆 她爱死了

translation.en: Cap said grow it out, guys. What happened?
translation.zh: 队长叫我留发 结果呢？

translation.en: -What happened? -Be careful!
Vern knows Krav Maga!
-She'll take you down. -Don't even think...
All right, pencils down.
The other five teams have been interviewed.
And Cap, we're all counting on you, so, you know...
translation.zh: 队长 我们就靠你了 所以…

translation.en: -no pressure. -Thanks, buddy.
translation.zh: -不要搞得压力太大 -多谢了 伙计

translation.en: -See you soon, boys. -Yep.
Give them hell, Cap.
Bin Laden has been financing the Taliban and al Qaeda
translation.zh: 本拉登资助塔利班和基地组织

translation.en: setting up terrorist training camps all over Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 在阿富汗境内设立多处 恐怖分子训练营

translation.en: He's had one big win on US soil.
translation.zh: 他袭击美国本土 战果颇丰

translation.en: He wants another.
And if we don't stop him, there will be more.
translation.zh: 要是不阻止他 那将后患无穷

translation.en: Bin Laden might be the brains, but make no mistake about it,
translation.zh: 本拉登也许是主脑 但别搞错了

translation.en: in Afghanistan, the Taliban is the muscle.
translation.zh: 在阿富汗 武装力量掌握在塔利班手里

translation.en: If we remove them from power,
he can't use them to make his attacks.
translation.zh: 他就无力发动恐怖袭击

translation.en: Mazar-i-Sharif.
Whoever controls that city, controls Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 得那座城市者得阿富汗

translation.en: If we take Mazar from the Taliban, then we cripple bin Laden.
translation.zh: 我们从塔利班手中夺下那座城市 就能削弱本拉登的力量

translation.en: Well, that's half-right.
If you're gonna interrupt me, you should be entirely right.
translation.zh: 你想打断我 就应该对你说的话要有十足把握

translation.en: No, we aren't taking anything.
translation.zh: 不 我们不会攻下那座城市

translation.en: The man who's gonna take Mazar is named General Dostum.
translation.zh: 杜斯塔姆将军会攻下马扎里沙里夫

translation.en: He's an Afghan warlord with the Northern Alliance.
translation.zh: 他是北方联盟的阿富汗军阀

translation.en: He has the troops, he has the intel, he knows the cliffs.
translation.zh: 他手下有军队 情报充足 熟知地形

translation.en: He knows every cave, and most importantly,
translation.zh: 哪里有洞穴都一清二楚 最重要的是…

translation.en: he does not care for the Taliban.
translation.zh: 他一点也不喜欢塔利班

translation.en: So, this is about airstrikes?
translation.zh: 所以我们是要提供空中增援？

translation.en: Sorry, sir.
No, you nailed that one.
Dostum cannot take out the Taliban by himself.
translation.zh: 杜斯塔姆一个人扳不倒塔利班

translation.en: Here's the plan.
We're gonna drop you into Northern Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 你们会空降到阿富汗北部

translation.en: There, you will meet up with a CIA operative who will take you to Dostum.
translation.zh: 那边有位中情局特工 会带你们去见杜斯塔姆

translation.en: Your mission...
earn Dostum's trust,
translation.zh: 是取得杜斯塔姆的信任

translation.en: embed with his militia,
you fight alongside him while he makes his way to Taliban strongholds.
translation.zh: 与他并肩作战 攻向塔利班据点

translation.en: When you get there, you call in for close air support strikes.
translation.zh: 到时你们再请求近距支援空袭

translation.en: Dostum will do the rest. One by one, stronghold by stronghold,
translation.zh: 其它的事交给杜斯塔姆 一个据点一个据点攻下来

translation.en: until he takes Mazar, and the Taliban falls.
translation.zh: 直到他拿下马扎里沙里夫 塔利班垮台

translation.en: You got six weeks.
I'd say three weeks, sir.
translation.zh: 我觉得只有三周 长官

translation.en: -Goddamn it. -No, no.
All right, I'll bite.
Why three?
The Russians have been here before. They've done this.
translation.zh: 俄国人也在这里打过仗 对吧？

translation.en: And they wrote about it.
They said the snow was shutting down all the mountain passes by mid-November.
translation.zh: 到了11月中旬 大雪会阻断所有山路

translation.en: Every year, without fail.
If Russians talk about a bad winter, it's usually worth paying attention to.
translation.zh: 连俄国人都提及的严冬气候 绝对值得我们留意

translation.en: After three weeks, we will not get into Mazar.
translation.zh: 要是三周后我们攻不下马扎里沙里夫

translation.en: That snow will hit, the Taliban will dig in, and my men won't come home.
translation.zh: 雪一下 塔利班一躲 我们就回不了家了

translation.en: Your air support comes from B-52s at 35,000 feet.
translation.zh: B-52轰炸机从一万米高空投弹

translation.en: How are you gonna get close enough to be accurate
translation.zh: 你们要怎么靠得够近 以进行精确标记

translation.en: -without parking a bomb in your lap? -I'll have to get out of the way, sir.
translation.zh: -自己又不会挨炸？ -躲远点就行了 长官

translation.en: The extra three weeks is cushion for your fuck-ups.
translation.zh: 多给三周是怕你们搞砸 以防万一

translation.en: There won't be any. Three weeks is all we need.
translation.zh: 不会搞砸的 三周就够了

translation.en: Pretty confident for a guy who's never done this before.
translation.zh: 你们明明没有经验 还这么自信啊

translation.en: Never been to war.
Well, I don't see that as a disadvantage, sir.
translation.zh: 我觉得这点并不会让我们吃亏

translation.en: Well, maybe you should explain that.
We're teaming up with a warlord that we know nothing about.
translation.zh: 我们要跟一名完全陌生的军阀联手

translation.en: We're not gonna be able to tell our enemies from our allies.
Every step we take is gonna be on a minefield from 100 different wars.
translation.zh: 各方势力错综复杂 每一步都如履薄冰

translation.en: And no one's ever called in a smart bomb airstrike from a B-52.
translation.zh: 也从未有人在战场上 呼叫过B-52进行精确空袭

translation.en: So, anyone who tells you they've done this before
translation.zh: 那些说执行过 有经验的人

translation.en: or has experience in this is lying, sir.
There's no playbook here. We have to write it ourselves.
translation.zh: 根本没有先例 我们得随机应变

translation.en: I briefed five potential captains for this mission.
translation.zh: 我给五名队长介绍了这次任务

translation.en: About a 100 years of military experience between them.
translation.zh: 他们的军事经验加起来得有一百年了

translation.en: But you're the only one that sees it the way it is.
translation.zh: 只有你看出了这次任务的本质

translation.en: I choose you.
You and 11 men.
Task Force Dagger.
I would be remiss if I did not say to you,
translation.zh: 有些话我不讲就是失职了

translation.en: even in success... the odds of you coming home...
translation.zh: 就算你们成功完成任务… 你们回家的机率…

translation.en: They're 100%, sir, with all due respect.
translation.zh: 是百分之百 长官 恕我直言

translation.en: See, I kind of made a promise to.
translation.zh: 我自己也承诺了要平安返家

translation.en: You know better than that, Nelson. What'd she get you to?
translation.zh: 你不该轻易承诺 尼尔森 你承诺什么时候回家？

translation.en: Christmas.
It's a hell of a thing we do, isn't it?
translation.zh: 我们这次任务也是很不容易啊？

translation.en: How do you love your family and leave them to go to war?
translation.zh: 离开心爱的家人去打仗

translation.en: You're wheels up at 2200. Dismissed.
translation.zh: 晚上十点直升机起飞 解散

translation.en: No, no. Knock that off. Go.
Captain.
The most important thing a man can take into combat is a reason why.
translation.zh: 在战斗中 知道为何而战非常重要 能给你提供动力

translation.en: This is from the towers.
translation.zh: 这是世贸双子塔的残骸

translation.en: You carry that with you.
Five weeks ago, 19 men attacked our country.
translation.zh: 五周前 我们的祖国 遭到十九名恐怖分子的袭击

translation.en: The 12 of you will be the first ones to fight back.
translation.zh: 你们这十二位战士将发动第一波反攻

translation.en: Go win this thing.
Thank you, sir.
-Good guy! Yeah! -Son of a bitch. We're the first ones in!
Yeah, it's kind of like the Apollo program.
translation.zh: 对啊 搞得有点像阿波罗计划

translation.en: You know what they sent into space first, right?
translation.zh: 你知道最早登上太空的是什么吧？

translation.en: -What? -A monkey.
Great.
But, listen, brother.
If it's six weeks, it's six weeks, okay? We can't rush this.
translation.zh: 上头说六周完成就六周完成 不能急

translation.en: We're in harm's way no matter what the weather.
translation.zh: 不管天气如何 任务都很危险

translation.en: If your only goal is trying to keep us alive, we're dead men for sure.
translation.zh: 你如果一心只想保住大家的命 我们就死定了

translation.en: I ain't losing one man on this team, Hal.
translation.zh: 这支队伍一个人也不能少 哈尔

translation.en: The only way home is winning.
Well, shit, I believe you. Come on, let's tell the boys we're up.
translation.zh: 该死 我信你了 走吧 去通知大家 要上战场了

translation.en: This woman was stoned to death for being pregnant out of wedlock.
translation.zh: 这个女人因为未婚怀孕 惨遭石刑处决

translation.en: This is what the Taliban does to women in Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 在阿富汗 塔利班就是这样对待女人的

translation.en: God, just shut that shit off.
translation.zh: 天哪 把这玩意关掉

translation.en: -It's what they gave us for intel. -But that's not intel, that's motivation.
translation.zh: -这是上面给的情报 -那又不是情报 那是给我们动力

translation.en: And I got two towers full of that.
translation.zh: 想想双塔遇袭的惨状 我们就很有动力了

translation.en: You don't need to study, Falls. You just shoot the guy shooting at you.
translation.zh: 不必研究了 佛斯 谁打你 你就打谁

translation.en: Is that how that works? Thank you very much, Mr. Wizard.
translation.zh: 是这样吗？谢谢你啊 大师

translation.en: -Hey, look, Michaels. It's you. -Jesus Christ, you guys are jealous.
translation.zh: -迈克尔斯 你看 是你啊 -该死 你们就是眼红

translation.en: What do you call that? Is it like a coif or something?
-Guys... -I don't do bad hair.
Listen up!
All right, boys.
It's us. We're going in.
translation.zh: 选中我们了 要上场了

translation.en: -Yeah! -Fuck yeah!
We beat out the five other teams. We're gonna drop in behind enemy lines,
translation.zh: 我们击败了其余五支参选队伍 将深入敌后

translation.en: link up with a warlord of the Northern Alliance,
General Abdul Dostum.
We'll assist him in fighting the Taliban
and taking back the city of Mazar-i-Sharif, which happens to be
the stronghold and linchpin for the entire northern Taliban force.
translation.zh: 那是塔利班在阿富汗北部的 据点和枢纽

translation.en: Now, if we don't take that city,
translation.zh: 要是我们拿不下那座城市

translation.en: the whole country will turn into a goddamn terrorist training camp.
translation.zh: 整个阿富汗都会成为 他妈的恐怖分子训练营

translation.en: World Trade Center's just the beginning. They're not finished with us yet.
translation.zh: 世贸中心的袭击只是开始 他们还没闹完

translation.en: The catch is, we only have 21 days.
translation.zh: 麻烦的是 我们只有21天时间

translation.en: -How many troops does he have? -He's got about 200 paid soldiers
translation.zh: -杜斯塔姆将军有多少兵力？ -他手下有大约两百名职业军人

translation.en: and an undetermined number of part-time militia.
translation.zh: 和一些民兵 人数不明

translation.en: -What about the other side? -The other side has about
50,000 Taliban and al Qaeda fighters.
translation.zh: 五万塔利班和基地武装分子

translation.en: Missiles, armor, rockets,
translation.zh: 装备有导弹 装甲车 火箭弹

translation.en: mortars, machine guns.
We're outnumbered.
Just 5,000 to one.
What I call a target-rich environment.
I kind of like those odds.
Now gentlemen,
once we land, we're about nine hours away from help.
translation.zh: 我们空降着陆以后 援军要九小时才能到

translation.en: Which effectively means it doesn't exist. We're on our own.
translation.zh: 基本可以说 没有援军 我们得靠自己

translation.en: We all need to understand that capture is not an option here.
translation.zh: 大家都必须明白 不存在当俘虏这个选项

translation.en: We've all seen the intel on what the Taliban does to their prisoners?
translation.zh: 大家都看过情报了 知道塔利班怎么对待俘虏吧？

translation.en: -Evident, sir. -Those motherfuckers will make you suffer.
translation.zh: -很清楚 长官 -那些混蛋会让人生不如死

translation.en: Shit goes south, I'm dying with my boots on.
translation.zh: 要是出差错 我绝对力战而死

translation.en: -Amen. -As am I.
Hear, hear.
We go in tonight. Single ship, no backup.
translation.zh: 我们今晚过去 没有回头路 没有后援

translation.en: So, police your gear, get some rest.
translation.zh: 大家准备好装备 休息一下

translation.en: Had a successful test flight?
We are the test flight.
If you die,
that's a letter you and your wife are gonna wish you wrote.
translation.zh: 你和你老婆都会希望你留了封信

translation.en: I just made her a promise I'm coming home.
translation.zh: 我之前还答应她 我会回家的

translation.en: I ain't writing her a letter that says I broke it.
translation.zh: 我才不要写信说我食言了

translation.en: We got one, two,
three, four,
five, six...
I guess that space suit answers the question
about closing the freaking doors.
-What's your cruising altitude? -That's a good question.
translation.zh: -你们会飞多高？ -这是个好问题

translation.en: Well, it must be above 10,000 feet,
if you're using O2.
Shit, the mountains we're flying over are 10,000 feet.
translation.zh: 要飞越的山脉 就有海拔3000米以上

translation.en: The sandstorms would ruin the engines,
and missiles have been fired from the peaks.
translation.zh: 还有人在山上用导弹攻击我们

translation.en: Well, that puts us at 20.
You can't fly a Chinook at 20,000 feet.
translation.zh: 支奴干直升机飞不上6000米

translation.en: We're not gonna. Flight altitude's 25.
translation.zh: 我们不会飞在6000米高 我们要飞到7600米高

translation.en: Huh.
-Well, how's this thing take it? -We'll find out.
translation.zh: -这玩意撑得住吗？ -待会就知道了

translation.en: Is there O2 for my team?
We got masks, but they don't work. Hell, ours didn't work last flight.
translation.zh: 后面有面罩 不过不管用 上次飞行的时候 我们的也不管用

translation.en: This dipshit started seeing bogeymen. Almost crashed into the damn mountain.
translation.zh: 这白痴都出现幻觉了 差点就一头撞山上了

translation.en: Oh, shit. We're gonna go hypoxic.
Not me.
Keeping my eyes on that fucker right there.
We're going to the clouds, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 我们要飞上云霄了 各位

translation.en: No one's ever flown a chopper this high this far.
translation.zh: 没有直升机飞过这么高 这么远

translation.en: Strap in tight!
-I've never been hypoxic before. -Really?
Oh, it's great.
All you do is faint.
Think of it as a nine-hour nap.
It's not the going to sleep that worries me.
It's the goddamn hangover on the other side.
Yeah, baby!
Well, you know why the Army uses Chinooks, right?
translation.zh: 你们知道陆军 为什么用支奴干直升机吧？

translation.en: Why?
So we'll be good and mad when we get into battle.
translation.zh: 好让我们上战场之前好好爽一番

translation.en: Yeah!
Yes, I know, man! I'm a laugh factory!
Mission equipment is set. EOS, flare, chaff.
translation.zh: 行动装备就绪 紧急供氧 热诱弹 干扰箔

translation.en: Five-nine-five, we are clear for takeoff.
Silver wings upon their chest These are men
translation.zh: 胸前别着银翼勋章 他们是

translation.en: America's best
One hundred men will test today
translation.zh: 今日接受考验的一百人

translation.en: But only three win Green Beret
translation.zh: 只有三人能戴上绿色贝雷帽

translation.en: Hey, 595, this is 1213.
Visibility is deteriorating.
We're turning back. Blind alley.
translation.zh: 我们要掉头 没办法了

translation.en: Hang on! We're descending.
On purpose?
-On purpose? -Roger that. Wheels down, two minutes.
-Two minutes! -Two minutes!
Wake up!
Jock up, NODs on!
Right gunner has landing area in sight, 3425.
translation.zh: 右门枪手已看到降落地

translation.en: -Going in hot. -Twenty.
Here we go!
Fifteen, ten, nine, eight. Hold your forward.
Bring it down.
Cleared on left, cleared on right.
translation.zh: 左边安全 右边安全

translation.en: On five, four, three. Ramps cleared down. Ramp, ramp, ramp.
translation.zh: 倒数5 4 3 舱门安全 开舱门

translation.en: Hey.
There.
-See those two fellas? -Yeah.
-Is this our escort? -I don't think so.
translation.zh: -是来接应我们的吗？ -应该不是

translation.en: We're supposed to be meeting a squad. I don't think these are our guys.
translation.zh: 来的应该是一支小队 我觉得不是他们

translation.en: Shut them up.
Put your fucking weapons down!
Drop your fucking weapons!
Drop your weapons!
No! No! No! Friendlies! Friendlies! Stand down!
translation.zh: 不不不！是友军！友军！解除戒备！

translation.en: Our weapons down!
-Let them up. That's your fucking escort. -Let them up.
translation.zh: -让他们起来 他们是来护送我们的 -让他们起来

translation.en: We're sorry.
Right.
If you could just tell him we apologize?
translation.zh: 可以跟他说 我们很抱歉吗？

translation.en: -Team leader? -Yeah, I am.
-You guys are late. -Well, we're here now.
You don't speak Dari?
-Not at all. -How's your Uzbek?
So-so. My Russian's decent.
translation.zh: 还凑合吧 俄语还不错

translation.en: Russian will get you through. We should move.
translation.zh: 会俄语就行了 我们该走了

translation.en: It's a long hike. They dumped you in a bad spot.
translation.zh: 要长途跋涉 你们的降落点不好

translation.en: Let's go, grab your gear. Let's move.
-Hey! Back up! No! -Yo, yo, yo.
Yeah, thank you.
This is it.
They call it the Alamo.
Get you set up in here.
Why don't you guys take first watch? Rotate every two hours.
translation.zh: 你们两个先站哨 两小时换一次岗

translation.en: Head on a swivel.
-Roger that. -On it.
You know everyone died in the Alamo, right?
translation.zh: 你知道阿拉莫之战是全军覆没吧？

translation.en: I think you should keep that to yourself.
Oh, this is great. Yeah, this is gonna go over real well in a Muslim country.
translation.zh: 这玩意不错 在穆斯林国家绝对受欢迎

translation.en: It ain't our job to choose the gifts, man. It's yours.
Come on in.
This is your new home.
Hey, feel free to eat any of that. The bread's good.
translation.zh: 要吃什么别客气 面包很棒

translation.en: I don't know what this is, but it's fucking great.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是什么 但是非常好吃

translation.en: Give me the lay of the land. What kind of intel you got?
translation.zh: 跟我介绍一下状况 你有什么情报？

translation.en: Well, here's what I know, and it ain't much.
translation.zh: 我知道的不多 就以下这些

translation.en: What's left of the Northern Alliance is essentially three separate militias.
translation.zh: 北方联盟的民兵基本上分为三派

translation.en: All right? That are all enemies with each other.
General Dostum, General Atta, and General Mohaqiq.
translation.zh: 杜斯塔姆将军 阿塔将军 莫哈奇克将军

translation.en: So, you got a three-pronged attack
that doesn't communicate, will not assist each other,
translation.zh: 互不沟通 互不协助

translation.en: and if they meet on the battlefield, they'll probably stop fighting the Taliban
translation.zh: 在战场上遇到对方 八成会扔下塔利班

translation.en: and start killing each other.
What about our contact, General Dostum?
translation.zh: 我们的接头人杜斯塔姆将军呢？

translation.en: General Abdul Rashid Dostum.
translation.zh: 阿布都拉希德杜斯塔姆将军

translation.en: Okay, he's Uzbek.
Started fighting the Russians when he was 16. He's 55 now.
translation.zh: 16岁开始打俄国人 现在55岁

translation.en: Yeah, we have his bio. What's he like?
translation.zh: 我们知道他的生平 他人怎么样？

translation.en: -What's he like? -Yeah, what's he like?
translation.zh: -人怎么样？ -对 他人怎么样？

translation.en: His personality. Angry, happy, sad?
translation.zh: 他的性格是残暴？开朗？忧郁？

translation.en: -He likes show tunes. -He likes show tunes. Great.
translation.zh: -他喜欢歌舞剧曲目 -他喜欢歌舞剧曲目 不错

translation.en: Look, I read people for a living, and I can't get a bead on this guy.
translation.zh: 我专门揣摩别人的心思 但我完全摸不透他

translation.en: Okay?
Only two things I know for sure.
He hates the Taliban, and they hate the shit out of him.
translation.zh: 他恨塔利班 塔利班恨死他

translation.en: How worried should we be about any of these guys
translation.zh: 我们是不是要担心 周围这些人

translation.en: trying to sell us to the Taliban?
translation.zh: 会把我们出卖给塔利班？

translation.en: I'd be pretty fucking worried, if I was you.
translation.zh: 要我说的话 我会挺担心的

translation.en: Right.
-Does Dostum speak English? -No. He speaks Tajik.
translation.zh: -杜斯塔姆会说英语吗？ -不会 他会说塔吉克语

translation.en: He speaks Uzbek.
He speaks Dari.
He speaks Pashtun, which is what the Taliban speak.
translation.zh: 会说塔利班说的普什图语

translation.en: And he speaks Russian. So, you got that going for you.
translation.zh: 还有俄语 所以对你有利

translation.en: -Are you with us through this? -No, I'm leaving right now.
translation.zh: -你要跟我们一起执行任务吗？ -不 我现在就要走了

translation.en: I got a 50-kilometer hike to give a bag of money to another warlord.
translation.zh: 我要跋涉五十公里 给另一个军阀送钱

translation.en: Who knows, maybe we'll see each other on the battlefield.
translation.zh: 搞不好我们会在战场上相遇

translation.en: If we do, don't shoot the guy in the backwards cap.
translation.zh: 如果真的相遇的话 可别对反戴帽子的人开枪

translation.en: We'll keep that in mind.
God, that spook is cheery.
Yeah, running around here alone, setting this thing up?
translation.zh: 独自在这里奔走安排这件事

translation.en: Say one thing about him,
he's got giant balls.
Hey.
-So, where is he? -Who?
Dostum.
No clue.
He knows we're here though, right?
Whole fucking country knows you're here.
translation.zh: 全阿富汗的人都知道你们来了

translation.en: Best of luck, Captain.
-I mean it. -You, too.
Give 'em hell.
Come look at this.
Graveyard of Empires, and we're in it.
translation.zh: 帝国的坟场…我们就在其中

translation.en: Shows you how unlucky it is to write on that wall,
translation.zh: 由此可见 在那面墙写字是很不吉利的

translation.en: so no one better do it.
translation.zh: 最好不要有人在上面写字

translation.en: Hey, Cap.
Get some rest, all right?
-Something ain't right here. -Now, look.
This is about being smart, not superhuman.
translation.zh: 我们要聪明行事 而不是当超人

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
I'm gonna take the next watch.
Massoud.
When he died, the Northern Alliance might have died with him.
translation.zh: 他一死 北方联盟差点也垮了

translation.en: Move!
-Move! -That Dostum?
General.
Assalamu alaikum. Peace be with you.
Wa-Alaikum-Salaam.
What did he say?
He said it's good to know the language of your enemies.
translation.zh: 他说 了解敌人的语言挺不错的

translation.en: -Am I doing this alone? -All right, let's go.
translation.zh: -我要一个人跟他走吗？ -我们一起走

translation.en: Looks like Spencer got a promotion. I guess he prefers brunettes.
translation.zh: 看来斯宾塞升官了 我猜他喜欢棕头发的人

translation.en: Yeah, seems that way, huh?
All right, why don't we give him the gift?
Feed. For your horses.
My horses thank you.
-What did he say? -I don't think the horse feed's a big hit.
translation.zh: -他说什么？ -我觉得他不怎么喜欢马饲料这礼物

translation.en: Well, that went over like a bag of shit.
translation.zh: 感觉跟收到一袋大便一样

translation.en: You wanna try the vodka, Captain?
General.
To our new American friends.
I hope they don't think they win copying the Russians.
translation.zh: 但愿他们不会以为学俄国人就能赢

translation.en: I was told you didn't speak English.
I didn't speak to the man who told you I don't.
translation.zh: 那是我没跟那人说过英语

translation.en: Where are my bombs?
I have more bombs than you'd ever want. Could you show me the Taliban's location?
translation.zh: 将军 你想要多少炸弹我这都有 请你告诉我塔利班的位置…

translation.en: -Why the young one speak? -He's our captain, sir.
translation.zh: -为什么是这位年轻人在跟我说话 -他是队长 先生

translation.en: -Tell them to stand down. -Hey, Diller.
General, I'm the captain.
This is my team. You speak to me, all right?
translation.zh: 这是我的队伍 有事得跟我谈

translation.en: -This is my country. -I understand that.
You own the land, but we own the sky.
translation.zh: 你制地 但我们制空

translation.en: You want our bombs, talk to me.
translation.zh: 你想要我们的炸弹 就跟我商量

translation.en: Okay. We talk.
Why these men follow you?
-I could ask you the same question. -You don't want the answer.
translation.zh: -我也可以这样反问你 -你不会想知道答案的

translation.en: Look. Look. Those eyes.
translation.zh: 你看 看啊 那双眼睛

translation.en: Killer eyes.
Those eyes. Killer eyes.
translation.zh: 那双眼睛 杀手的眼睛

translation.en: Yes. Killer eyes.
What did you kill?
You wanna see me kill?
You take me to the Taliban, and I'll show you.
translation.zh: 告诉我塔利班在哪 我就让你见识

translation.en: Okay. We go.
That was easy.
Buddy, you better check that fucking swagger
translation.zh: 兄弟 你最好摸清那混蛋的底细

translation.en: before he sells us to the highest bidder.
translation.zh: 免得他把咱们给卖了赚笔大的

translation.en: Listen, he needed to know how far I can be pushed. Now he does.
translation.zh: 他现在知道我的底线了

translation.en: Fucking killer's eyes.
General, how far away is the Taliban?
translation.zh: 将军 塔利班离这里多远？

translation.en: Five hours. I have horses for you.
Wait, there's only six. I need 12. I got 12 men.
I have six.
Hey, Cap.
Looks like he's not done pushing you.
translation.zh: 看来他还要再越过你底线啊

translation.en: I don't like splitting up the team, Hal.
It was bound to happen sooner or later. Might as well be now.
translation.zh: 迟早要分 现在分也好

translation.en: At least he's willing to fight.
I figured he'd just milk us for supplies and money.
translation.zh: 我还以为他只想要物资和钱

translation.en: Can you show me on the map exactly where we're going?
translation.zh: 你可以在地图上指给我看 要去哪里吗？

translation.en: Cobaki. Over the mountains.
translation.zh: 寇巴基 山的另一边

translation.en: All right, Diller, Coffers, Michaels, Bennett, Jackson, you're with me.
translation.zh: 迪勒 考佛 迈克尔斯 贝内特 杰克逊跟我走

translation.en: Falls, Black, grab the daypacks, extra ammo.
translation.zh: 佛斯 布莱克 背包多带些弹药

translation.en: I took Dehi four days ago from Taliban.
translation.zh: 我四天前从塔利班手中攻下德希

translation.en: Mullah Razzan, leader of the Taliban, has a high price on your heads.
translation.zh: 塔利班的领袖穆拉拉赞 出高价悬赏你们项上人头

translation.en: Hundred thousand US dollars for your body.
-Fifty thousand for your bloody uniforms. -That's it?
A little low.
-Toss a little change out, Taliban. -Well, look on the bright side.
translation.zh: -塔利班好歹加点价啊 -往好的方面想

translation.en: If his plan was to cash us in, he'd find another six horses for sure.
translation.zh: 他要是想出卖我们 绝对会把马备齐

translation.en: I guarantee it.
All right, who's ridden before? Anyone?
Summer camp, when I was nine.
translation.zh: 九岁参加夏令营的时候骑过

translation.en: Cancun, spring break. But I was pretty drunk.
translation.zh: 春假去墨西哥玩 不过当时我喝高了

translation.en: -I can't ride for shit. -Okay, so that's nobody.
translation.zh: -我完全不会骑 -所以就是没人骑过

translation.en: Great, this will be fun. All right.
translation.zh: 不过骑马很好玩的 好

translation.en: Okay, so a kick means "go." This is the steering wheel.
translation.zh: 踢马腹就是走 缰绳是方向盘

translation.en: Left to go left, right to go right. Pull back to stop.
translation.zh: 左扯左转 右扯右转 向后扯是停

translation.en: Okay. He's not waiting for us. Saddle up.
translation.zh: 他不会等我们的 上马吧

translation.en: I'll start a supply chain, okay? Schedule a drop.
translation.zh: 我会开一条补给线 安排空投物资

translation.en: Does it have a name?
-Request ammo for Dostum's men. -But does it have a name?
translation.zh: -帮杜斯塔姆将军要弹药 -名字…我知道 它叫什么名字？

translation.en: And Michaels will be on the radio. We'll check in every four hours.
translation.zh: 迈克尔斯负责无线电 每4小时回报

translation.en: -He's gonna test you. -Yeah. I'm gonna test him, too.
translation.zh: -他会测试你 -是啊 我也会测试他

translation.en: -I'm not sure that's a good idea. -About to find out.
translation.zh: -那样不太好吧 -很快就知道了

translation.en: -Oh. Goddamn it. -Good luck, boys.
You guys look like a bunch of naturals.
translation.zh: 看起来你们天生就会骑马啊

translation.en: -Don't break the horse, Dill. -Shit.
translation.zh: -别把马骑垮了 迪勒 -该死

translation.en: Don't be afraid.
You're a brave girl, I can tell.
translation.zh: 你很勇敢 我看得出来

translation.en: Tell me,
do you know the animal with the long neck?
translation.zh: 你知道那种脖子很长的动物吗？

translation.en: Giraffe.
That's right.
How is it spelled?
Look at me.
E.
Smart girl.
Can anyone tell me...
Fifteen times eight...
equals what?
One hundred and twenty.
Well done.
Please, Mullah Razzan! I beg you!
translation.zh: 穆拉拉赞 求求你！求求你！

translation.en: Don't do it, I beg! Don't, in the name of God!
translation.zh: 求求你不要这样！以真主之名！

translation.en: For God's sake, don't do it!
translation.zh: 看在真主的分上 拜托不要！

translation.en: For God's sake. For God's sake...
Be strong.
God is great!
You all know His divine law.
translation.zh: 你们都知道他神圣的律法

translation.en: No girl over the age of eight years
is to be educated.
You wanted a teacher?
Now you have learned.
I don't like how they're looking at us, Cap.
translation.zh: 队长 我不喜欢他们看我们的眼神

translation.en: Hey, Cap, we got three AK's and a spotter at three o'clock.
translation.zh: 3点钟方向有3人手持AK47 还有一个观测员

translation.en: Yeah, I see it.
-What the fuck are we stopping for? -I don't know.
-Supplies. -Yeah, well, we're sitting ducks here.
translation.zh: -补给物资 -我们在这里是瓮中鳖

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me.
Risking our asses for ten gallons of water.
translation.zh: 为了10加仑水赌上我们的性命

translation.en: No, he's showing us off.
He's saying, "Look at the Americans. They're here with me."
translation.zh: 他在说 “看这些美国人 他们来挺我了”

translation.en: Hey, don't fucking look down!
Where you look, the horse goes.
Move your head, it shifts your weight and shifts the horse's weight.
translation.zh: 头一动 你和马的重心就跟着动

translation.en: -Got it? -Yeah, yeah, I got it.
-Hey, boss. -Yeah.
He's got us on the north side of this range.
translation.zh: 他把我们带到山脉北边了

translation.en: -I'm guessing that isn't good. -No.
Commo satellites orbit to the south.
There's no way I'm gonna get any signal through that mountain range.
translation.zh: 隔着山脉绝对收不到信号

translation.en: Gonna have to go up on the plateau and try to get better contact.
translation.zh: 我得爬到高处去设法接收信号

translation.en: He's got us camping in a dead spot.
translation.zh: 他把我们带到死角扎营

translation.en: Think he knows it's a dead spot?
Hey, I know every cell phone dead zone in my hometown.
translation.zh: 我知道我老家的每个信号死角

translation.en: -No GPS either, huh? -No, it's pretty shitty.
Your men are too slow.
We will kill the Taliban in the morning.
translation.zh: 我们早上就去杀塔利班

translation.en: I see you.
Yeah, I know it. I see that.
That's a cool musket.
Najeeb? Cool, I'm gonna take a piss now, so...
translation.zh: 纳吉布？好 我要撒尿了 所以…

translation.en: No, no. No. Like to do this alone, bro.
translation.zh: 不要 我喜欢自己尿

translation.en: Respect the culture.
This fucking kid.
-Milo? -What's up, bro?
-Looks like you got a shadow. -Yeah.
You see Dostum's men ride up that mountain today?
-Yeah. -Had his whole army ready to
travel in five minutes.
My guess is, the Taliban ain't much different.
-It's not gonna be easy. -Yeah, these people are tough.
How do you know so much about horses?
Well, I grew up on a ranch.
translation.zh: 我小时候在牧场长大的

translation.en: My father taught me.
About the only thing he was ever good and gentle with were horses.
translation.zh: 他大概只对那些马匹温柔和善

translation.en: So, the old man ruled with an iron fist?
translation.zh: 所以你小时候他经常用拳头揍你？

translation.en: And a leather belt. Anything he could get his hands on.
translation.zh: 还有皮带 拿到什么用什么

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Must have been best friends with my old man.
translation.zh: 那他跟我爸真是一路人

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
I hope they let us see this one through, you know?
I mean, Afghanistan's been invaded
for the last 2,000 years repeatedly by everyone.
-Genghis Khan, Alexander the Great... -You been reading up on the place?
translation.zh: -成吉思汗 亚历山大大帝… -你仔细研究过这里了？

translation.en: I was a history teacher.
-Get the fuck out! -No! I swear to God!
-You serious? -Yeah.
Shit, that's right. No, I remember reading something about it.
translation.zh: 该死 我也记得有看到过

translation.en: In your report. It wasn't long though. What happened? I didn't...
translation.zh: 你档案里有记录的 但是当的时间不长 怎么了？

translation.en: I got into a fight with this guy who was harassing my girlfriend,
translation.zh: 有人骚扰我女朋友 我揍了他一顿

translation.en: and I kind of beat him up pretty bad.
Where I was headed, I was headed to jail. So, I chose the military.
translation.zh: 眼看着要去坐牢 所以…我选择从军

translation.en: Shit, man. And here you are, years later, sitting in a cave.
translation.zh: 多年后你坐在这个山洞里

translation.en: Yeah. I should have chosen jail.
Why do your men stand guard?
You're my guests. I protect you.
translation.zh: 你们是客人 我会保护你们的

translation.en: We're not just your guests, General. We're your allies.
translation.zh: 我们不只是客人 将军 还是盟友

translation.en: My men aren't standing guard against, they're standing with you.
translation.zh: 我的人不是防你们 是一起防守

translation.en: -This is my responsibility. -This is how we're trained.
translation.zh: -这是我的责任 -我们受过训练的

translation.en: We have orders to follow.
That's the difference between you and me.
translation.zh: 这就是你与我之间的差别

translation.en: You have many men over you. Over me, only God.
translation.zh: 你上面有很多人 我上面只有神

translation.en: God, that was...
-That was some real bonding right there. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他怎么突然这么热情了 -是啊

translation.en: Sir, sitrep from Spencer.
translation.zh: 长官 斯宾塞发来现场报告

translation.en: He's requesting a supply drop for Dostum's men.
translation.zh: 他请求为杜斯塔姆的人空投物资

translation.en: Winter's coming, and they need gear and provisions.
translation.zh: 快入冬了 他们需要装备和粮食

translation.en: Yeah, ship it out. Where's Nelson?
Not sure. Terrain's cutting off radio reception.
translation.zh: 不清楚 那里的地势阻断无线电信号

translation.en: He thinks that Nelson's en route to Dostum's HQ.
translation.zh: 他觉得他们正前往杜斯塔姆的总部

translation.en: -Our best guess is here. Cobaki. -All right, hold on.
translation.zh: -我们推测是这里 寇巴基 -等等

translation.en: -Why aren't Nelson and Spencer together? -Nelson split the team.
translation.zh: -尼尔森和斯宾塞怎么没在一起？ -尼尔森把人分成两组

translation.en: He took six men and left Spencer and the others at the recon point.
translation.zh: 他带六人 留斯宾塞和其他人在侦察点

translation.en: -Christ, why'd he do that? -Dostum only gave him six horses.
translation.zh: -我的天 为什么要这样？ -杜斯塔姆只给他六匹马

translation.en: Apparently, that's the only way to cross the mountains.
translation.zh: 显然只有骑马才能翻山越岭

translation.en: According to Spencer, the horses aren't just transportation.
translation.zh: 斯宾塞说 马匹不只是交通工具

translation.en: Spencer says Dostum relies on them for combat.
translation.zh: 他说杜斯塔姆还靠它们打仗

translation.en: -Horses? -Yes, sir.
There. Mullah Razzan's men.
Wait, where?
You see the pickup trucks?
translation.zh: 你看到那些皮卡车了吗？

translation.en: Those are the Taliban forces outside of Bescham.
translation.zh: 那就是他们部署在拜申村外的兵力

translation.en: Right. Okay, General, let me explain how this works.
translation.zh: 好的 将军 我跟你说明一下

translation.en: I need to be close enough to give exact coordinates and elevation.
translation.zh: 我要靠得够近才能提供准确坐标…

translation.en: -It's too dangerous. -We're too far away.
-I can't call in anything from here. -Five hundred of my men can die
translation.zh: -我无法从这里请求空中支援 -我每折损五百人

translation.en: before one American gets a scratch.
translation.zh: 才能有一个美国人受皮肉伤

translation.en: -You know why? -No. Why, sir?
translation.zh: -你知道为什么吗？ -为什么？先生

translation.en: Because if one American die, your government leaves,
translation.zh: 要是有一个美国人死了 你们政府会离开

translation.en: -and then we lose the war. -Okay.
I'm dropping these bombs from 30,000 feet.
The plane doesn't guide the bombs, I do.
translation.zh: 引导炸弹的不是飞机 是我

translation.en: If I can't get close enough,
-I can't call in the exact location. -Give me your map.
translation.zh: -就无法提供… -把你的小地图给我

translation.en: Give me your map.
There. See? Here. Taliban.
translation.zh: 那里 看到没？这里 塔利班

translation.en: -Here. Taliban. -Okay.
And here, Taliban.
-Now drop your bomb. -He's not getting it.
translation.zh: -丢炸弹吧 -他没明白我的意思

translation.en: -And we're still too far away. -Drop bombs.
-How do I even know this is the Taliban? -Who else would it be?
translation.zh: -我怎么知道他们是塔利班？ -不然会是谁？

translation.en: There are a lot of armies in these mountains.
The US is only at war with one of them.
translation.zh: 只有一支是美国的敌人

translation.en: You call me a liar?
I'm not saying that, just saying we're so far away
translation.zh: 不是 我只是说距离太远

translation.en: I can't even tell what we're shooting at, what we're hitting.
Razzan, I'm here with the Americans. They are coming to kill you.
translation.zh: 拉赞 我跟美国人在一起 他们要来杀你了

translation.en: Christ. He's calling the fucking Taliban.
translation.zh: 该死 他在联络塔利班

translation.en: They want to know you are Taliban.
translation.zh: 他们想知道你们是不是塔利班

translation.en: Tell them you are Taliban so we can kill you.
translation.zh: 跟他们说你们是 我们好宰了你们

translation.en: America, fuck you!
Mullah Razzan. See? Drop bombs.
Badger 17, this is Alpha 595.
We need a drop on enemy position.
Eight-four-seven-two, six-five-four-three.
How copy? Over.
Alpha 595, I copy.
Eight-four-seven-two, six-five-four-three. Over.
Roger. Drop when ready.
translation.zh: 收到 准备好就投弹

translation.en: You hit the green on this one, you're a goddamn wizard.
translation.zh: 要是这次能击中 老大你就神了

translation.en: Yeah, no shit.
Shit.
All right, someone explain to these guys we missed.
I told you, you donkeys.
translation.zh: 我就说吧 你们这群蠢驴

translation.en: God damn. Shit.
You damn bastard.
That was ridiculous.
I didn't come here to play around. Check fire, we're way off.
translation.zh: 我可不是来胡闹的 暂停投弹 偏太远了

translation.en: Stay here. I'll call back coordinates.
translation.zh: 留在这里 我会传回坐标

translation.en: No, no, Nelson.
-Where's Cap going? -I don't know. Coffers.
I'm getting closer.
Wasn't gonna let you have all the fun.
translation.zh: 怎么能让你一个人过瘾？

translation.en: You ready for new coordinates?
Yeah, we got some anxious people up here.
translation.zh: 好 这里气氛很紧张

translation.en: Eight-three-nine-six--
Bad element maneuvered in on them.
Captain, there's an element moving in on you.
translation.zh: 队长 有敌军靠近你了

translation.en: All right, stay here. Let's go!
I'll say it again.
Eight-three-nine...
six-four-five-seven.
Clear and hot.
Bombs inbound, boys! Let's move!
We're danger close, Cap!
translation.zh: 队长 我们在射程内！

translation.en: Move back! Move!
Move!
Razzan. You're finished.
General. Their forward position's obliterated.
translation.zh: 将军 已摧毁前方阵地

translation.en: Why aren't we moving on the village?
You will not live long here if you ignore what I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 在这里不听我的话就活不久

translation.en: You told me to bomb, that's what I did. Why aren't we attacking?
translation.zh: 你叫我炸 我也炸了 为什么不进攻？

translation.en: That wasn't the plan today.
You mind telling me the plan?
We attack tomorrow.
Tomorrow. Great. So, that was, what?
translation.zh: 明天才进攻 那刚才是闹哪样？

translation.en: -Nice little dress rehearsal? -A rehearsal, yeah.
Great.
I'm not gonna negotiate.
These are my boots. You know, the ones you stole from our drop.
translation.zh: 这是我的靴子 你偷了我们的空投物资

translation.en: I don't know what that means.
I bet you we haven't even found half our shit.
translation.zh: 我们收到的物资肯定不到一半

translation.en: Yeah.
That roof looks familiar, doesn't it?
Hey, how much, huh?
What is that? $10? $9.50?
Huh?
They got ten percent of our MREs, a quarter of our blankets.
translation.zh: 他们拿走我们10%的口粮 25%的毛毯

translation.en: We're missing a lot.
What?
-Guess they like our chem suits. -Tres chic.
translation.zh: -他们喜欢我们的化学防护服 -很时髦啊

translation.en: I'd like to tell you it gets easier, but...
translation.zh: 我很想说习惯了就好 但是…

translation.en: You know, every now and then, you meet a guy who doesn't feel anything.
translation.zh: 其实 时不时就会有那种 毫无感情的人

translation.en: He goes out there, kills people.
Falls asleep before his head hits the pillow.
translation.zh: 回到家里还没躺下就睡着了

translation.en: You know, I used to think that that'd be better, right?
translation.zh: 我以前都觉得那样比较好

translation.en: That maybe I was just too weak.
Then I realized, no.
That's the thing that reminds us that we're humans.
translation.zh: 那并不是软弱 有这种感觉才算是个人

translation.en: Hey, here we go.
How'd you make out? Falls.
-All kinds of goodies. -Good.
Get most of it back?
It was like shopping at Macy's.
translation.zh: 就像去商场疯狂购物了一样

translation.en: -Hey, yo, Spence, bro. -Yeah.
-See that little kid over there? -Yeah.
I can't take a piss without the kid up in my business.
translation.zh: 我撒泡尿 他都要跟在我后面

translation.en: Well, it is pretty fascinating.
No, not really. It's not.
No. He follows me around like a little stray dog.
translation.zh: 他就像流浪狗一样跟着我

translation.en: -Why don't you stop giving him treats? -That's the thing.
translation.zh: -你别再给他东西吃了 -问题就是

translation.en: I don't give him shit.
He just follows me around smiling with his little 1910 gun.
translation.zh: 他就一直拿把古董枪跟着我

translation.en: -You don't get it, do you? -What, Spence?
These guys guard us.
Any one of us gets killed,
Dostum might execute the man he thinks is responsible and his whole family.
translation.zh: 杜斯塔姆会追究责任 处以死刑 还株连全家

translation.en: And this poor boy got you.
translation.zh: 这可怜的小孩负责保护你

translation.en: So, be nice.
Be nice.
Do you, uh...
Hey, Najeeb?
Here, bro, I, uh... got you a little...
It's a little sucker.
Put it in your mouth.
No!
You take the thing off it.
And then you put it in your mouth. Yeah. Put it in your mouth. Yeah.
translation.zh: 然后再放进嘴巴 对 放进嘴巴 对

translation.en: Don't even fucking go there, bro.
translation.zh: 你给我闭嘴 少啰唆

translation.en: Don't go there. Give me my shoes.
-That's cute. -Shut up.
This is their next objective: Bescham.
translation.zh: 这是他们下一个目标 拜申

translation.en: There's only one way in, and the Taliban know it.
translation.zh: 塔利班知道 要进攻那里只有一条路

translation.en: They're dug in hard
just outside of town right here, heavily fortified.
translation.zh: 构筑大量掩体与防御工事

translation.en: The whole thing's a buzzsaw, sir.
Yeah, then why the hell is Nelson walking into it?
translation.zh: 那尼尔森为什么要自投罗网？

translation.en: Shit.
Did I pick the wrong guy?
Sir, this one's not on Nelson.
It's geography.
Bescham is the only way to Mazar.
translation.zh: 前往马扎里沙里夫必须经过拜申

translation.en: Yeah, maybe so. But we can't pin all our hopes on Nelson.
translation.zh: 也许是吧 但我们不能光指望尼尔森

translation.en: Let's get a second team in the works.
If Dostum doesn't make it to Bescham by the time the weather sets in,
translation.zh: 要是杜斯塔姆没在入冬前攻下拜申

translation.en: it's gonna be a real shitshow.
General, B-52s are in position.
translation.zh: 将军 B-52轰炸机就位了

translation.en: You have any idea what's going on?
Dostum need to find out if his nephew still over there
translation.zh: 杜斯塔姆还在问他外甥是否还在

translation.en: fighting along with Talibans.
Many switch sides.
For necessity, loyalty change.
Some every other week.
Why the hell would they do that?
A lot of these guys are farmers.
translation.zh: 他们中大部分都是农民

translation.en: Taliban comes through, they torture, murder, force them to fight.
translation.zh: 塔利班来了 又打又杀逼他们打仗

translation.en: What choice do they have?
Is it just me, or does it feel like these assholes
translation.zh: 是我想太多 还是这些混蛋

translation.en: are counting their money every time they look at us?
translation.zh: 每次看我们的时候都在心里估价？

translation.en: General.
His nephew left this morning. We can proceed.
translation.zh: 他外甥早上走了 可以继续前进了

translation.en: Oh, great. War's back on, guys.

If I'd known, if you'd told me,

translation.zh: 你要让你的人去送死 随便你 但你别想害我的人

translation.en: -in harm's way, you understand? -Everywhere you go is harm's way.

translation.en: No shit.
We're fighting with horsemen against tanks.

translation.en: You don't have a stomach for everything I know.

translation.en: Fuck.
You will not win here because you are not honest with yourself.

translation.en: You expect victory without blood.
I expect you to share strategic information with us.

translation.en: Otherwise what the fuck are we doing here?
Your anger comes from your fear,

translation.en: That's not this place.
Here, Taliban kills everything you live for.

translation.en: Your mission will fail because you fear death.

translation.en: Mullah Razzan's men, the Taliban, they welcome it

translation.en: because they believe there is riches waiting for them in heaven.

translation.en: You gotta stop guarding me and start trusting me.

translation.en: Start using this, and you can be a warrior, too.

translation.en: Come with me.
Sit.

translation.en: Out here, there's nothing.
No passage, no water. No shade.

translation.en: So, the only way to Mazar-i-Sharif is through Tiangi Gap.

translation.en: Yes, to get access to their stronghold in Tiangi,

translation.en: we must first take Bescham.

translation.en: than what we've been doing.

I got you. Okay.

You can keep that $20.

Uzbek game.

women wore no veils.

"When are you gonna get off your ass and get to Mazar?"
Jesus Christ.

"I'm advising a man how to employ horse-mounted cavalry
translation.zh: “我在协助的这位 带着骑兵

translation.en: Lisa, get in here.
"With snipers having less than 100 rounds,

translation.zh: “我们目睹这些骑兵翻山越岭

translation.en: to attack Taliban strongpoints.
The last several kilometers under mortar, artillery, and sniper fire."
translation.zh: 最后几公里路是顶着枪林炮雨”

translation.en: That's Mitch.
"Everywhere I go to, the civilian and local soldiers are always willing
translation.zh: “所到之处的百姓士兵都告诉我

translation.en: to tell me that they're glad the USA has come,
translation.zh: 很欢迎美国军队的到来

once the Taliban are gone."
Raven, this is Charlie 595. Good drop. Good drop.

-Yeah. -Come over here, please!

translation.en: Oh, shit. No, don't make me laugh.

Headquarters inserted ODA 555 with Atta's militia.

translation.en: Could be.
You might wanna break up camp now in case you gotta get out of here quick.

You've just been handed the most important diplomatic job in the free world;
translation.zh: 你刚刚接下了自由世界里 最重要的外交工作

translation.en: keeping the Northern Alliance together.
translation.zh: 那就是维持北方联盟的统一

translation.en: Oh, finally. I'm starving to death.

translation.en: Assalamu alaikum.
Habib.

-He says they're not for sale. -Everything's for sale.

translation.en: Okay, tell him that we'll give him 50 American dollars.
He says he will take $500.
For that?
-How much are they worth? -A hundred.
Okay.

Yes?
Good?

translation.en: -All right. -Great. Lamb chops.
translation.zh: -好 -太好了 可以吃羊排了

translation.en: It's a great day, my friend.
translation.zh: 朋友 今天是好日子

translation.en: The Taliban pulled back to protect the Gap.
translation.zh: 塔利班往后撤 去守峡谷了

translation.en: We can move forward to here in the morning.
translation.zh: 我们早上就可以前进到这里

translation.en: If we do tomorrow right, we can run them all the way to Mazar.

translation.en: This war is won or lost tomorrow.
General, I wanna explain one of the other missions

translation.en: that are taking place tomorrow.

translation.en: There's another team like mine,
translation.zh: 还有一支我们这样的小队

translation.en: and they've been placed with General Atta Mohammed.
translation.zh: 派给了阿塔穆罕默德将军

translation.en: They're moving on Mazar from the southeast.

translation.en: They gave north to Atta.

translation.zh: 对美国来说 你们都是北方联盟

translation.en: Who is the US to tell me what Northern Alliance is?

translation.en: The mission hasn't changed, General.

translation.en: We'll punch through this Gap into the city.

translation.en: Tiangi Gap is over two kilometers long.
Razzan's best weapons are right here. Machine guns, mortars, heavy armors.
translation.zh: 拉赞最精锐的武器都集中在这里 机关枪 迫击炮 重型战车

translation.en: And right here is 055 Brigade.
Foreign fighters. Al Qaeda. They won't give an inch.

translation.en: They prefer death.

translation.en: I'm gonna put a man on each flank,
and we're gonna overwhelm this canyon with air support.
I've already sent Diller downrange.

translation.en: Then you and I are gonna charge through this Gap

translation.zh: 正面攻击他们的主要部队

translation.en: But Atta cannot get to Mazar first.

translation.en: Told me every hell Razzan and his army unleashed on this place.

translation.en: And now all you care about is some turf war?

translation.en: You lectured me about the heart of a warrior.

translation.en: You're no warrior. You're just another warlord.

translation.en: Yeah, go ahead.
It ain't us that's quitting, General, it's you.
translation.zh: 放弃的不是我们 是你

translation.en: That's not a happy face.
I don't think Dostum's on board.
translation.zh: 我觉得杜斯塔姆不干了

translation.en: What do you mean, "not on board"?
He says he won't fight a battle
that opens a way for his rival to take the city.
translation.zh: 为死对头开路拿下马扎

translation.en: Not very big-picture of him.
He's fighting more than one war here.
translation.zh: 在这场战争中 他的对手不只一个

translation.en: I don't like it, but these are the cards we've been dealt.
translation.zh: 我也不乐意 但现实如此

translation.en: Yeah, well, Captain, you gotta talk to him.
translation.zh: 队长 你得找他谈谈

translation.en: I did. He's gone.
translation.zh: 谈过了 他已经走了

translation.en: He's taken most of his men, most of the militia, and they've left.
Listen, I ain't gonna lie to you guys.
The chances are, we are not gonna make it out of this one.
translation.zh: 我们很有可能无法全身而退

translation.en: Goddamn, we're this close.
translation.zh: 妈的 我们都这么接近了

translation.en: We're so close to wiping al Qaeda out of Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 马上就能把基地组织彻底赶出阿富汗

translation.en: We'll never get another chance like this.
But if we quit now...
then what happened back home is gonna happen again and again.
translation.zh: 那些恐怖袭击就会一而再 再而三发生

translation.en: Each of you gotta make this decision...
but I'm in.
We're ready for anything.
With or without him.
Fuck him.
We're already here, right?
All right.
We go in the morning. You take what's left of the guards with you.
translation.zh: 我们早上出发 把剩下的人都带上

translation.en: Get some rest tonight.
Tomorrow's gonna decide it one way or another.
Spencer, Black. You call in air strikes from the eastern flank.
translation.zh: 斯宾塞 布莱克 从东侧请求空袭

translation.en: Milo, Jackson and Essex have been pushed out
translation.zh: 麦洛 杰克逊 埃塞克斯

translation.en: against the enemy's western flank right here.
translation.zh: 他们在西翼这里逼近敌人

translation.en: Diller, Coffers and Bennett will cover the enemy's northern flank
translation.zh: 迪勒 考佛和贝内特会守住北侧

translation.en: in an attempt to block reinforcements from Mazar.
Falls and Michaels, cover Jones and me
translation.zh: 佛斯和迈克尔斯从南边的狙击点

translation.en: from the sniper position on the southern flank.
Here we go down the rabbit hole.
translation.zh: 我们要迎来一场硬仗了

translation.en: -All right, Vern. -Yeah.
Who wins in a fight?
Queen Elizabeth or Margaret Thatcher?
translation.zh: 和撒切尔夫人打架 谁会赢？

translation.en: Jesus, Falls. Where do you come up with this shit?
translation.zh: 该死 这是什么鸟问题？

translation.en: From the depths of my brilliant mind.
translation.zh: 我聪明过人的脑袋想出来的

translation.en: Seeing that, Boss?
Falls, a scout just picked us up. My two o'clock. Over.
translation.zh: 佛斯 有侦察兵发现我们 在我2点钟方向 完毕

translation.en: Target.
Got him.
Six hundred fifty yards.
Hold to left.
Good hit.
Coffers, get that radio up.
-I need ten minutes. -You got five.
Like I said, five minutes.
No Dostum, huh?
K2 base, this is 595 Delta. Over.
Request medevac on standby. Over. Roger.
translation.zh: 请求救护直升机待命 完毕 收到

translation.en: Shit.
How we looking, J?
Hey, we're in the right spot.
Fuck, there's gotta be at least 15,000 down there.
translation.zh: 该死 底下起码有一万五千人

translation.en: Spencer, this is Alpha. We're in position.
translation.zh: 斯宾塞 这里是A组已就位

translation.en: Start lasing targets of opportunity. Biggest guns first. Over.
translation.zh: 先攻击可能的目标 从最大火力开始 完毕

translation.en: I am your biggest gun, Cap.
Diller, welcome back, man. How was your trip?
translation.zh: 迪勒 欢迎归队 旅途如何？

translation.en: Oh, I'm doing great.
I'm looking at timeshares over here for the summer.
translation.zh: 我正在物色在这度暑假的别墅

translation.en: All right. Let's do this, boys.
translation.zh: 好 开始行动吧 伙计们

translation.en: Heads down, stay safe.
translation.zh: 千万小心 一切平安

translation.en: All right, good to go.
All right, good.
-Hey, yo, J? -Yeah.
Zero-five-five brigade. Al Qaeda.
-Gotta lead them a bit more, bro. -All right. Gotcha.
translation.zh: -得再把他们引出来一点 -好 知道了

translation.en: Viper 47, this is Bravo 595.
Laser target designator 38.65.
Target, tanks in the open.
translation.zh: 目标是空旷处的坦克车

translation.en: Nice shot, chief.
How's that taste, huh?
Okay, Bravo, good drop. Shift your targets 500 meters south. Over.
translation.zh: B组 炸得好 目标往南移5百米 完毕

translation.en: Viper 47, new target. Multiple troops in the open.
translation.zh: 毒蛇47 新目标 空旷处的大量部队

translation.en: Drop 500 meters east...
Chief? Chief.
How'd they find us?
translation.zh: 他们怎么会找到我们的？

translation.en: They surrendering?
Chief, are they surrendering?
Maybe.
Might be a trick.
Keep your finger on the trigger, okay?
No sudden moves!
What do you wanna do with them?
Alpha 595, this is Bravo 595. We got a situation here.
translation.zh: 595小队B组呼叫A组 这里有状况

translation.en: Multiple enemy combatants attempting to surrender at our position.
translation.zh: 多名敌方战斗人员前来我方阵地投降

translation.en: Put your hands up.
Roger, Bravo. Give me a sitrep when they're contained. Over.
translation.zh: 收到 把他们控制住就报告 完毕

translation.en: Flash 21, this is 595 Charlie. Request immediate--
translation.zh: 595小队C组呼叫闪光21 请求即刻…

translation.en: We gotta get that goddamn antenna!
Cover me!
Oh, shit!
They got a BM-21, and they're going into the Gap!
translation.zh: 他们有多管火箭炮车开进峡谷！

translation.en: Do you want to surrender?
Do you understand?
No, no. Just... just stay there.
Stay there, okay?
If you wish to surrender, you stay right there.
translation.zh: 如果要投降 就别再靠近

translation.en: Stop. All right.
All right. We gotta search each one of these guys.
translation.zh: 好 所有人都得搜身

translation.en: One by one.
-You hear me? -Okay. Yeah.
Stay sharp.
Allahu Akbar!
Hal?
Hal? Shit.
Oh, shit! Hal? Hal?
Hal...
Hal? Oh, God. Hal, come on, buddy. Hal. Hal!
translation.zh: 哈尔？天哪 醒醒啊 兄弟 哈尔！

translation.en: Hal?
Shit.
No, no, no. Hal. Hal, come on, buddy. Come on.
translation.zh: 不要啊 哈尔 撑住

translation.en: No, no, no.
Hal.
Hal! Hal! Come on! Oh, shit! Okay.
Hey, buddy. Come on.
Any station, Bravo is down! Bravo is down!
-How bad? -Bad!
I need immediate medevac!
I'm on it, sir.
Here, fix this!
Sir, better late than never, huh?
translation.zh: 队长 迟到总比不到好对吧？

translation.en: Let's go!
-How about now? -Yeah, good.
Alpha, this is Charlie. Do you read me?
translation.zh: C组呼叫A组 听到了吗？

translation.en: Go ahead.
There's a BM-21 in the Gap loaded with rockets.
translation.zh: 山谷内有装填完毕的多管火箭炮

translation.en: Oh, shit.
What the fuck is that?
Black, give me Spencer's status.
translation.zh: 布莱克 报告斯宾塞的状况

translation.en: It's a sucking chest wound. He's on a real clock here.
translation.zh: 是开放性气胸伤口 他撑不了太久了

translation.en: All right, ready? Three, two, one. Up. Easy.
-Hey. Movement. -Let's roll, boys. Let's roll.
Get down.
translation.zh: 趴下 趴下 趴下

translation.en: Essex, can you target the BM-21?
translation.zh: 埃塞克斯 你能锁定火箭炮吗？

translation.en: Negative.
-Pulling back? -Back to the horses.
Move!
Go!
Taliban's gonna swamp your position before a medevac can get in.
translation.zh: 塔利班会比救护直升机先赶到你们那

translation.en: Put the radio to Spencer's ear.
All right, this is double or nothing, Hal. We're gonna evac you.
translation.zh: 现在不是一举两得就是完败 哈尔 我们要把你送走

translation.en: Don't stop.
We're not. We're airlifting you from the other side of the Gap
translation.zh: 不会的 我们要从峡谷的另一头

translation.en: on the road to Mazar-i-Sharif.
It's the only way, Hal.
translation.zh: 只有这个办法了 哈尔

translation.en: Remember, the only way home is winning.
translation.zh: 记住 想回家就只能赢

translation.en: You hang in there, my friend.
Call the drop now!
464, adjust your target 20 meters west.
How copy? Over.
Good copy, 595. But we are not authorized so close to you.
translation.zh: 收到 595小队 但你们在炸弹射程内我们不能投弹！

translation.en: Danger close, bro!
464, requesting danger close ordnance!
Copy that. Danger close. Twenty seconds.
translation.zh: 收到 射程内投弹 20秒

translation.en: -Get the fuck out of here! -Let's go! Run!
Essex?
-Jackson? -Yeah.
-Fuck. -Yeah.
Najeeb?
Najeeb.
Najeeb...
Najeeb.
Come on, Najeeb. Come on.
-Milo? -Yeah.
E!
Come on, Najeeb. Come on, bro. Come on.
translation.zh: 起来啊 纳吉布 快起来

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Go help Jackson.
-Go help Jackson! -Look at me!
Help Jackson!
Jackson? Get up!
-Get up! -Come on, Najeeb.
We gotta go. We gotta go.
E!
All right. All right?
Najeeb? You all right?
Come on. Come on. Let it out, man.
Let it out. We gotta go. We gotta go.
translation.zh: 咳出来 我们得赶快走了

translation.en: Cap, we lost communication with Essex.
translation.zh: 队长 失去了和埃塞克斯的联络

translation.en: Keep trying.
Listen, if we don't take out that BM-21, this whole thing is over.
translation.zh: 听着 不毁了火箭炮就全盘皆输了

translation.en: It fires 40 rockets in salvos. Got it?
translation.zh: 它一次是40连发 懂吗？

translation.en: Forty, and then two minutes to reload.
-Say it back to me. -Two minutes.
That's how long we're gonna have to storm their position,
but we must get closer,
and hold there until they stop to reload.
translation.zh: 然后挺住直到他们装弹

translation.en: K2 base, this is Alpha.
Lead elements crossing phase line red. Anticipate high casualties.
translation.zh: 主力部队将向敌人发起冲锋 可能有大量伤亡

translation.en: He's charging! Follow him!
Allahu Akbar!
Thirty-eight. Thirty-nine.
They're gonna have to reload soon. We'll have two--
translation.zh: 快要重新装弹了 会有2分…

translation.en: -Captain! -Now's our window. Let's go!
Contact front!
Where's Diller?
Moving to our position. Bird incoming in two minutes.
translation.zh: 正往我们这里移动 直升机2分钟后到

translation.en: Copy.
Rendezvous at evac sight and pop smoke.
translation.zh: 现场集合 放信号弹

translation.en: Get the horses out of here! There's a chopper coming.
translation.zh: 把马牵走！直升机要来了

translation.en: -How's he doing? -Cap, I need that medevac here right now!
-All right, it's coming. -Chopper's inbound!
translation.zh: -好 已经来了 -直升机飞近！

translation.en: Jones, get that smoke out!
Here they come, buddy. Here they come.
You hang in there, buddy.
-Did we get them? -Yeah, man. We got them.
We got them good.
Hey. Hey, you hang in there. Don't you quit on us.
translation.zh: 喂 你撑住 可别扔下我们

translation.en: Let's cover him up! Cover up!
Okay, ready?
Three, two, one! Up!
Has anyone seen Dostum?
Eye in the sky says full retreat over here.
translation.zh: 空中观测到敌军全数撤退

translation.en: The whole Gap is clear.
They're bugging out all the way from Mazar.
Does air visual have eyes on Atta's militia?
translation.zh: 有观测到阿塔的民兵吗？

translation.en: Yeah, they're approaching from the east.
translation.zh: 有 他们从东边靠近

translation.en: Dostum's going for Atta.
This whole thing falls apart if the Northern Alliance breaks.
translation.zh: 要是北方联盟分裂 就全毁了

translation.en: We have to get to Dostum first! Head to Mazar!
translation.zh: 我们得先追上杜斯塔姆！ 出发前往马扎！

translation.en: Let's go!
-General, wait. -General Atta.
I will let Atta have the city today.
Tomorrow, we'll see.
Well, you made the right choice.
Right choice?
There are no right choices here. This is Afghanistan.
translation.zh: 这里没那回事 这里是阿富汗

translation.en: Graveyard of many empires.
Today you are our friend, tomorrow you are our enemy.
translation.zh: 今天是朋友 明天就是敌人

translation.en: It won't be any different for you.
Soon America will become just another tribe here.
translation.zh: 美国将成为这里的另一个部族

translation.en: You will be cowards if you leave.
translation.zh: 如果你们离开就是懦夫

translation.en: And you will be our enemies if you stay.
translation.zh: 留下来就是我们的敌人

translation.en: Just know...
that you will always be my brother.
When I get into that city, I will raise your flag.
translation.zh: 等我走进那座城市 我会升起你的旗帜

translation.en: It's your city, General. You raise your own flag.
translation.zh: 你的城市升你的旗帜就好

translation.en: Here.
It's been with me forever.
-Now it's yours. -Thank you.
Yo.
Thank you for looking out for me.
If you cry, I'm telling everyone.
translation.zh: 你要是哭了 我会告诉大家

translation.en: Shut the fuck up, bro.
Welcome back!
Changed the extraction site, huh?
Yeah, I didn't think you'd walked far enough.
translation.zh: 我觉得你走不了那么远

translation.en: Yeah. I was thinking, "You know what? My knees feel way too good."
translation.zh: 是啊 我还想说我的膝盖也太能扛了

translation.en: -They look good. -Thanks.
-Did you see the medic? -Yeah.
Feels good, huh?
What, sitting down? Awesome.
translation.zh: 你是问坐下的感觉吗？棒呆了

translation.en: No, I mean to finally see one through.
translation.zh: 我是说总算达成任务了

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah...
We won the battle, you know.
Still gotta win the war.
Yeah. That ain't up to us.
Ain't our job anyway though, right?
translation.zh: 那也不是我们的工作 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
So, where are you going to point us to next?
I'm pointing us home.
I'll follow you there.
I'll follow you anywhere.
translation.zh: 我会追随你到天涯海角

translation.en: Thank God for that.
Spencer?
He's stable. On his way to Germany. You got him here in time.
translation.zh: 伤势稳定 正在送往德国 你及时把他送出来

translation.en: Kept your promise.
Yes, sir.
That's beautiful, Maddy.
Maddy! Come here!
Look, Christmas came early!
translation.zh: 你看 圣诞节提前来了！

translation.en: Daddy!
